name: atelier2
description: A comprehensive project management and task tracking system

scripts.sync-tasks: cd task-portal/parser && npm run build && node dist/cli.js sync ../../.tasks ../../.tasks/TASK_REGISTRY.json
scripts.sync-tasks:watch: cd task-portal/parser && npm run build && node dist/cli.js watch ../../.tasks ../../.tasks/TASK_REGISTRY.json
